item.title: End of the world
item.description: Lyrics Why does the sun go on shining? Why does the sea rush to shore? Don’t they know it’s the end of the world? ‘Cause you don’t love me any moreâ€¦ Why does the sun go on shining? Why does the sea rush to shore? Don’t they know it’s the end of the world? ‘Cause you don’t love me any more Why do the birds go on singing? Why do the stars glow above?

item.title: Levelland
item.description: Flatter than a table top Makes you wonder why they stopped here Wagon must have lost a wheel Or they lacked ambition one In the great migration west Separated from the rest Though they might have tried their best They never caught the sun So they sunk some roots down in this dirt To keep from blowin’ off the earth Built a town right here When the dust had all but cleared
